body:
Dear all.
Just wanted to announce the availability of LiVi version 0.3. LiVi is my add-on for Blender that acts as a pre/post-processor for Radiance. Major changes in this version are the use of gendaymtx for DDS, per-point numerical result display, and Radiance sky files can now be selected as a sky option. I've have done limited testing on linux (64bit) Windows 7 (64bit) and OS X 10.6/7 (32 & 64 bit).
LiVi can be downloaded for the LiVi website at http://arts.brighton.ac.uk/research/office-for-spatial-research/projects2/livi. LiVi is released under a GPL version 2 license and the code can be checked out at the Google Code repository https://code.google.com/p/livi/. Bug reports can also be left there. Questions, feedback etc can be posted to the LiVi mailing list at https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/livi-list.  


Finally, have a super weekend.


Ryan
